Private Cloud licensing
Use of the GreenData platform deployed via
rented cloud service
is available upon purchase of a license.
Purchase a license
To purchase a license, click on the “Buy a license” button.
This will open a tariff calculator that will allow defining the license parameters. The license cost will be displayed for the specified parameters.
If there is a need to select additional parameters or increase the limit, it is recommended to contact
sales department
.
After clicking on the “Continue” button, a form will be displayed for entering the name and E-mail of the future license holder.
After clicking on the “Pay” button, a form will open to verify the data of the selected tariff and the specified data, read and confirm the agreement with the offer, general terms and conditions and user agreement.
Clicking on the “Pay” button will open a form for payment. After successful payment wait for the license to be generated.
Payment for the license is only possible with a bank card.
After the license is generated, the user will be automatically redirected to the authorization page of the created application.
Default authorization data are used for the first login to the application:
login: admin
password: adminka
Bind a license
In order to replace the license in the application, click on the “Bind a license” button.
This will open a form for uploading the license file by clicking
or by dragging (Drag&Drop) the file into the upload area.
If a valid license is attached, the System will display its parameters.
To attach a license, read and confirm the agreement with the general terms and conditions and the terms and conditions of personal data processing, and then click on the “Apply license” button.
To delete a license, click on the
icon.
After attaching the license to the application, the user will be automatically redirected to the authorization page.
